barronSpline(float, float, float) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.OtherMath
A generalization on bias and gain functions that can represent both; this version is branch-less.

Constructs a useful default BiasGain interpolation with a smoothstep-like shape.

blend(int, int, float) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
 
BLUE_NOISE - Enum constant in enum class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.Dithered.DitherAlgorithm
This is an ordered dither that modifies any error in a pixel's color by using a blue-noise pattern for all channels, and 3 additional blue-noise patterns for each channel separately.

C

cbrt(float) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.OtherMath
An approximation of the cube-root function for float inputs and outputs.
cbrtShape(float) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.OtherMath
A function that loosely approximates the cube root of x, but is much smaller and probably faster than OtherMath.cbrt(float).
centralize(byte) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.OtherMath
Given a byte, pushes any value that isn't extreme toward the center of the 0 to 255 range, and keeps extreme values (such as the channel values in the colors max green or black) as they are.
centralizePalette(FileHandle, FileHandle) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PNG8
Given a FileHandle to read from and a FileHandle to write to, duplicates the input FileHandle and edits the red, green, and blue channels of each color in its palette (which is all colors in the image) by running each channel through a function (OtherMath.centralize(byte)) that biases any channel values that aren't extreme toward the center of their range, and keeps extreme values (such as max green, or black) as they are.
centralizePalette(FileHandle, FileHandle, float) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PNG8
Given a FileHandle to read from and a FileHandle to write to, duplicates the input FileHandle and edits the red, green, and blue channels of each color in its palette (which is all colors in the image) by running each channel through a function (OtherMath.centralize(byte)) that biases any channel values that aren't extreme toward the center of their range, and keeps extreme values (such as max green, or black) as they are.
CHAOTIC_NOISE - Enum constant in enum class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.Dithered.DitherAlgorithm
Very similar to Dithered.DitherAlgorithm.BLUE_NOISE for a still frame, albeit less orderly, but in an animation this will change wildly from frame to frame, taking an ordered dither (one which uses the same blue noise texture that Dithered.DitherAlgorithm.BLUE_NOISE does) and incorporating one of the qualities of an error-diffusion dither to make each frame dither differently.

compareSwap(int[], int, int) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Compares items in ints by their luma, looking up items by the indices a and b, and swaps the two given indices if the item at a has higher luma than the item at b.

Given a FileHandle to read from and a FileHandle to write to, duplicates the input FileHandle and edits the red, green, and blue channels of each color in its palette (which is all colors in the image) by converting them to a 0.0-1.0 range and giving that to editor.

F

fastAnalysis - Variable in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.AnimatedGif
If true (the default) and AnimatedGif.palette is null, this uses a lower-quality but much-faster algorithm to analyze the color palette in each frame; if false and palette is null, then this uses the normal algorithm for still images on each frame separately.

getPalette() - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PNG8
 
GRADIENT_NOISE - Enum constant in enum class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.Dithered.DitherAlgorithm
Jorge Jimenez' Gradient Interleaved Noise, modified slightly to use as an ordered dither here; this can have subtle repetitive artifacts, but doesn't have different amounts of noise on different frames or different parts of an image (which is a potential problem for Dithered.DitherAlgorithm.DIFFUSION and the other error-diffusion dithers).

H

HALTONIC - Static variable in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
This 255-color (plus transparent) palette uses the (3,5,7) Halton sequence to get 3D points, treats those as IPT channel values, and rejects out-of-gamut colors.
height - Variable in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.AnimatedGif
 
hueShift() - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Edits this PaletteReducer by changing each used color so lighter colors lean towards warmer hues, while darker colors lean toward cooler or more purple-ish hues.

Returns true if the output is flipped top-to-bottom from the inputs (the default); otherwise returns false.

L

loadPreloadFile(FileHandle) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
If you saved a preload file with PaletteReducer.writePreloadFile(FileHandle), you can load it and give it to a constructor with: new PaletteReducer(intColors, PaletteReducer.loadPreloadFile(theFile)), where intColors is the original int array of RGBA8888 colors and theFile is the preload file written previously.

N

NEUE - Enum constant in enum class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.Dithered.DitherAlgorithm
An error diffusion dither that mixes in ordered noise from a triangular-mapped blue noise texture; this is the best-behaving dither here when it comes to smooth gradients.
NONE - Enum constant in enum class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.Dithered.DitherAlgorithm
Doesn't dither at all; this generally looks bad unless the palette matches the colors in the image very closely or exactly.

OtherMath.BiasGain - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.anim8

Often assigned as a field, the palette can be null (which means this may analyze each frame for its palette, based on the setting for AnimatedGif.fastAnalysis), or can be an existing PaletteReducer.

paletteMapping - Variable in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Stores the byte indices into PaletteReducer.paletteArray (when treated as unsigned; mask with 255) corresponding to RGB555 colors (you can get an RGB555 int from an RGBA8888 int using PaletteReducer.shrink(int)).
PaletteReducer - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.anim8
Data that can be used to limit the colors present in a Pixmap or other image, here with the goal of using 256 or less colors in the image (for saving indexed-mode images).

PATTERN - Enum constant in enum class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.Dithered.DitherAlgorithm
Thomas Knoll's Pattern Dither (with a 4x4 matrix), as originally described by Joel Yliluoma in this dithering article.
PNG8 - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.anim8
PNG-8 encoder with compression; can write animated and non-animated PNG images in indexed-mode.

populationBias - Variable in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Typically between 0.5 and 1, this should get closer to 1 with larger palette sizes, and closer to 0.5 with smaller palettes.
probit(double) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.OtherMath
A way of taking a double in the (0.0, 1.0) range and mapping it to a Gaussian or normal distribution, so high inputs correspond to high outputs, and similarly for the low range.

R

randomColor(Random) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Retrieves a random non-transparent color from the palette this would reduce to, with a higher likelihood for colors that are used more often in reductions (those with few similar colors).
randomColorIndex(Random) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Retrieves a random non-0 color index for the palette this would reduce to, with a higher likelihood for colors that are used more often in reductions (those with few similar colors).
readChunks(InputStream) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PNG8
Simple PNG IO from https://www.java-tips.org/java-se-tips-100019/23-java-awt-image/2283-png-file-format-decoder-in-java.html .
reduce(Pixmap) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Modifies the given Pixmap so it only uses colors present in this PaletteReducer, dithering when it can using Neue dithering (this merely delegates to PaletteReducer.reduceNeue(Pixmap)).
reduce(Pixmap, Dithered.DitherAlgorithm) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Uses the given Dithered.DitherAlgorithm to decide how to dither pixmap.
reduceBlueNoise(Pixmap) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
A blue-noise-based dither; does not diffuse error, and uses a tiling blue noise pattern (which can be accessed with PaletteReducer.TRI_BLUE_NOISE, but shouldn't usually be modified) as well as a 8x8 threshold matrix (the kind used by PaletteReducer.reduceKnoll(Pixmap), but larger).
reduceBlueNoiseSeparated(Pixmap) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
A blue-noise-based dither; does not diffuse error, and uses 4 tiling blue noise patterns (which can be accessed with PaletteReducer.TRI_BLUE_NOISE, PaletteReducer.TRI_BLUE_NOISE_B, PaletteReducer.TRI_BLUE_NOISE_C, and PaletteReducer.TRI_BLUE_NOISE_D, but shouldn't usually be modified).
reduceChaoticNoise(Pixmap) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
A white-noise-based dither; uses the colors encountered so far during dithering as a sort of state for basic pseudo-random number generation, while also using some blue noise from a tiling texture to offset clumping.
reduceFloat(float) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Looks up color as if it was part of an image being color-reduced and finds the closest color to it in the palette this holds.
reduceFloydSteinberg(Pixmap) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Modifies the given Pixmap so it only uses colors present in this PaletteReducer, dithering when it can using the commonly-used Floyd-Steinberg dithering.
reduceIndex(int) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Looks up color as if it was part of an image being color-reduced and finds the closest color to it in the palette this holds.
reduceInPlace(Color) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Modifies color so its RGB values will match the closest color in this PaletteReducer's palette.
reduceJimenez(Pixmap) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
It's interleaved gradient noise, by Jorge Jimenez! It's very fast! It's an ordered dither! It's pretty good with gradients, though it may introduce artifacts.
reduceKnoll(Pixmap) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Reduces a Pixmap to the palette this knows by using Thomas Knoll's pattern dither, which is out-of-patent since late 2019.
reduceKnollRoberts(Pixmap) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Reduces a Pixmap to the palette this knows by using a skewed version of Thomas Knoll's pattern dither, which is out-of-patent since late 2019, using the harmonious numbers rediscovered by Martin Roberts to handle the skew.
reduceNeue(Pixmap) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
An error-diffusion dither based on PaletteReducer.reduceFloydSteinberg(Pixmap), but adding in triangular-mapped blue noise before diffusing, like PaletteReducer.reduceBlueNoise(Pixmap).
reduceRoberts(Pixmap) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
An ordered dither that uses a sub-random sequence by Martin Roberts to disperse lightness adjustments across the image.
reduceScatter(Pixmap) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Modifies the given Pixmap so it only uses colors present in this PaletteReducer, using Floyd-Steinberg to dither but modifying patterns slightly by introducing triangular-distributed blue noise.
reduceSierraLite(Pixmap) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.PaletteReducer
Modifies the given Pixmap so it only uses colors present in this PaletteReducer, dithering when it can using Sierra Lite dithering instead of the Floyd-Steinberg dithering that PaletteReducer.reduce(Pixmap) uses.

ROBERTS - Enum constant in enum class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.Dithered.DitherAlgorithm
An ordered dither built around the lightness-dispersing R2 point sequence, by Martin Roberts.

S

SCATTER - Enum constant in enum class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.Dithered.DitherAlgorithm
This tries to subtly alter the more rigidly-defined error-diffusion dither of Dithered.DitherAlgorithm.DIFFUSION with a small amount of triangular-distributed blue noise, and unlike Dithered.DitherAlgorithm.CHAOTIC_NOISE, it doesn't introduce white noise.

shape - Variable in class com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.OtherMath.BiasGain
The shape parameter will cause this to imitate "smoothstep-like" splines when greater than 1 (where the values ease into their starting and ending levels), or to be the inverse when less than 1 (where values start like square root does, taking off very quickly, but also end like square does, landing abruptly at the ending level).
